text: Hagi rama'aza kagra ante'nanke'za, Aramu vahe'mo'za kagripinti keonke'zana eme mizanese'za mago'a zazmia zagorera eme kami'naze. Hagi tekusie nehaza havene, korankre tavravene, knare'za huza avonkre avankre hu'za hati'naza zantamine, knare'za huza tro hu'naza za'za tavaravene, kororiema nehaza zama hagerimpi nemanea zantamine, rubie nehaza haveraminena eri'za eme negamiza, nona hu'za zamavesia zana kagripintira eme eri'naze.
